QuestData.Title: A Bundle of Furs
QuestData.Description:
You there! Would you happen to be passing by Hatherford?
I have a delivery to make there, but my normal delivery person fell ill after a trip to Anglepoint.
Would you mind taking this bundle of furs to Dandy Jones in Hatherford for me? I would go myself, but I must hold down my stall.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Bundle of Warm Furs to Dandy Jones in Hatherford.
QuestData.CompletionText: Welcome to my inn, friend! How can I help ya?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, my furs! Thanks for the delivery. It's getting a bit cold out here - these will be perfect for the beds!$b$bIf you need food or a place to lay your head, I can offer you the best!
